LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Feature_Ena: Disable this to turn off feature without needing to uninstall mod
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Desperate_P: If enabled, desperate predators may hunt animals of any size.

If enabled, desperate normally non-predatory animals may hunt animals of any size. If disabled, they will only hunt animals their own size (multiplied by "Random target max relative size") or smaller.
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Desperate_A: If enabled, desperate animals of all kinds may hunt animals regardless of the targets combat power
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Desperate_H: Desperate herd animals eat own kind
If enabled, desperate herd animals may hunt animals of their own kind
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Desperate_A: If enabled, desperate pawns may attack others from the same faction.
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Desperate_H: If enabled, non-wild humans will automatically attack other creatures when desperate.
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Prey_Target: The maximum relative size a desperate non-predatory animal can target (unless "desperate prey ignore size" is enabled).
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Minimum_Mal: Minimum malnutrition required to hunt wounded target

A desperate creature with malnutrition above this level will hunt wounded targets that they wouldn't normally hunt. Will have no effect if equal to or higher than the minimum malnutrition required to hunt a healthy target.
Minimum malnutrition required to hunt healthy target
A desperate creature with malnutrition above this level will hunt healthy targets that they wouldn't normally hunt.
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Ignore_Fert: If enabled, fertilized eggs will be ignored by pawns seeking food.
LanguageData.CM_Desperate_Hunger_Settings_Desperate_P: If enabled, desperate normally non-predatory animals will pick a target at random. If disabled, they prioritize targets using the same formula as predators do in vanilla RimWorld.
